plugin.comment: Speed is in MPH, direction is in degrees: 0° North 90° East 180° South 270° West

These are all a function of the wind speed (between 0 MPH on the left and 200 MPH on the right)
bend: how much the decorators bend - 0.0 is standing straight up, 10.0 is super-flattened oscillation: how much the decorators 'oscillate' at a given speed frequency: how fast the oscillation waves each decorator gust size: big gusts move large areas of decorators in sync. small gusts give more variation
